SELECT a.id, a.title, a.description, a.image_url AS imageUrl, a.hashtags, u.nickname AS artistNickname, s.name AS studioName, a.like_count AS likeCount, a.is_public AS isPublic, a.created_at AS createdAt FROM artwork a JOIN "user" u ON a.user_id = u.id JOIN studio s ON a.studio_id = s.id WHERE a.is_public = true
AND a.hashtags ILIKE '%' || #{hashtags} || '%'
ORDER BY a.like_count DESC
ORDER BY a.created_at DESC
ORDER BY a.created_at DESC
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
